      void WESC(boolean activated)
      Activate Wheel-encoder signals copy.

        public void DigitalOutput(SmartBot.SmartBotPort Port,
                 boolean activated)
        Tell the robot to activate a digital output port. Priority function.
        Parameters:
        Port - Port number (from 1 to 4)
        activated - Default state : OFF

      • Servo

        public void Servo(SmartBot.SmartBotPort Port,
         int position)
        Tell the robot to put a servo output port in a specific position.
        Blocking function.
        Parameters:
        Port - Port number (from 1 to 4)
        position - from 0 to 99 (%)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • CLSC

        public void CLSC(boolean activated)
        Closed-loop speed control activation.
        Activation state IS memorized in the robot EEPROM.
        Parameters:
        activated - Default state : ON

      • WESC

        public void WESC(boolean activated)
        Activate Wheel-encoder signals copy.
        Left signal is copied to Digital output number 3.
        Right signal is copied to Digital output number 4.
        Activation state IS NOT memorized in the robot EEPROM.
        Parameters:
        activated - Default state : OFF
